data.q: Which HTML element is primarily used to collect user input?
data.explanation: The <input> element is commonly used to collect user input.

data.q: Which event is triggered when a form is submitted?
data.explanation: The submit event fires when a form is submitted.

data.q: What does event.preventDefault() do during form submission?
data.explanation: preventDefault() stops the browserâ€™s default form submission behavior.

data.q: Which attribute makes an input field mandatory?
data.explanation: The required attribute ensures the field must be filled before submission.

data.q: Which event fires when the value of an input changes?
data.explanation: The change event fires when the input value is committed.

data.q: Which property is used to access the value of an input field?
data.explanation: The value property retrieves or sets the current value of an input element.
